ModDescription: Speed up large purchases by holding both controller action buttons.
Config.MaxStack.Title: Maximum Speed
Config.MaxStack.Description: The maximum speedup as a multiplier of normal purchase speed (1x is default speed).
Config.TimeToMaxStack.Title: Acceleration Time
Config.TimeToMaxStack.Description: Time to accelerate from default speed to max speed. Lower values may save you precious seconds, but make quantities harder to precisely control.
